sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 13, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Not groomed at this time.  Please check back later this afternoon for updates.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be open on 2/15 and 2/16.  Golf course trails will be groomed.  Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Buck's run is in great shape. deep classic tracks. golf course has been rolled but still soft but skiable. conditions should firm up and provide great skiing this weekend. enjoy!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Being the very first on the groom today , I am biased : but boy oh boy it is nice at Nubs Nob ! LF 6

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 lifts, Rope Tow, and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. All trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM. Special night skiing session on this Sunday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Welcome to a beautiful day to ski or ride at Nub's Nob. Three inches of snow landed at Nub's Nob last night. This snow is now groomed into the base and conditions are excellent. Pintail Peak lodge is open until 3:30 PM. The Lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 PM to prepare for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
